text: The 1985 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship was won by Per Jonsson on July 14, 1985. ==European final== *July 14, 1985 * Abensberg, Motorstadion ==See also== 1985 Individual Speedway Junior Individual Speedway Junior Category:Speedway competitions in Germany Individual Speedway Junior
title: 1985 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
